channel.title: How to change prices of items in shops?
channel.description:
so I been working on my own server for a bit now and I made some armour shops and I have been wondering how you change the prices of the items in the shops :s [img]http://img113.imageshack.us/img113/1053/pic170or4.png[/img] [img]http://img113.imageshack.us/img113/2623/pic169cd8.png[/img]
Help would be greatly appreciated :)

item.title: How to change prices of items in shops?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

to change price go into item.cfg in your cfg folder and search for the price you want to change then change the first 3 numbers after the examine info to the price you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change prices of items in shops?
